"Addicted" is the debut single of rock band Saving Abel from their 2008 self-titled album Saving Abel.

The song is about a man who is "addicted" to a girl, either emotionally, or for the sex they have.

As of November 2008, "Addicted" has been certified Gold by the RIAA.

Saving Abel is an American rock band formed by Jared Weeks and Jason Null in 2004. The band&#039;s name references the biblical story of Cain and Abel. Saving Abel released their self-titled, major label debut album on March 11, 2008. The album features the single "Addicted" which peaked at #2 on the US Mainstream Rock Chart. As of November 2008 Saving Abel&#039;s self-titled album has sold over 222,858 copies and peaked at #53 on the Billboard 200.
